description: We had so much fun in our virtual escape room event earlier this year that we couldn’t wait to do it again! Last month, Team Justia was able to participate in another virtual escape room. Nobody was lost forever, and we all had a blast!.
The Dog Days of Summer may have arrived, but the heat can’t keep Zoey the Hug Pug down! She continues finding shady spots to play and enjoy the fresh air.
